levels.controls.toggleCylinder.name: Place Cylinder instead of Sphere
levels.controls.toggleVolumetric.name: Volumetric Template
levelsvolumetrictemplates.settings.volPe: The percentage of Volume or Area that is considered a valid target
levelsvolumetrictemplates.settings.check: Check collision of walls and floors between the origin of the template and the center of the token
levelsvolumetrictemplates.settings.3dtem: Set if the volumetric templates should be enabled on world load or not
levelsvolumetrictemplates.settings.handM: If enabled hand mode will be enabled on world load. When this mode is enabled templates will be placed by default at the height of the Hand of the token instead of it's elevation
levelsvolumetrictemplates.settings.dynam: Automatically determine if a Volumetric or Area template should be used. When this mode is active Circles and cones will always be volumetric and cones will automatically be computed at hand height
levelsvolumetrictemplates.settings.debug: Show Volume/Area Percentages on tokens when placing templates
levels.controls.handMode.name: Place templates at hand-height
levels.controls.ignoreSelf.name: Ignore Self
levels.controls.ignoreFriendly.name: Ignore Friendly Characters
